translation.en: -[man 2] Incoming! -[man 3] What the hell!
-[man 3] Let me go! -[woman 1] No! No!
-[man 4] Go, go, go! -[man 5] Come on, come on! Come on!
-[man 5] Clear! Clear! -[man 6] Hey, to the left.
translation.es: - ¡Vamos, vamos! - ¡Vía libre! - ¡Vía libre! - ¡Oigan, a la izquierda!

translation.en: [man 1] There she is, take her.
I mean, I miss my family and all that shit, of course, but...
translation.es: INSPIRADA EN LA NOVELA GRÁFICA HELSING, DE ZENESCOPE Bueno, extraño a mi familia y todo eso, claro, pero...

translation.en: It's just the little things.
Going to Subway for lunch.
[chuckles] Double meat on my sandwich.
Just because.
Yeah...
I don't know, man.
-I'm just talking. -[slurping]
Which you're probably pretty sick of by now, right?
translation.es: Tal vez ya estés harta de escucharme, ¿no?

translation.en: Yeah, that's okay. Go ahead.
-[snarls] -Yeah.
Yeah, that's it, Doc. Drink up.
That's good.
[sighs] I'd be fed up if I was you too.
translation.es: Yo también estaría molesto en tu lugar.

translation.en: -[sighs] -I mean, it's not your fault.
Oh, yeah, and Kit Kats. [laughs] I miss Kit Kats.
translation.es: También los chocolates. Extraño los chocolates.

translation.en: That little chocolate candy with the cookie thing in the middle
translation.es: Esos que tienen galleta en el medio

translation.en: and it goes snap when you break them. [clicks tongue]
translation.es: y hacen ruido cuando los partes.

translation.en: I miss Kit Kats.
Probably a ton of them out there too, just sitting there in stores.
translation.es: Quizás haya como una tonelada en las tiendas.

translation.en: Might as well be on the other side of the moon all the good it does me in here.
translation.es: Del otro lado de la luna darán tanto placer como me dan a mí aquí.

translation.en: -Hey, whoa. Hey, easy there. -[snarls]
Oi, just about drained me dry today, Doc.
Oh, shit.
There's something dicking around down by the southwest entrance.
translation.es: Algo sucede en la entrada sudoeste.

translation.en: Goddamn it.
[laughs] They're coming.
-So I'm gonna take care of it. -They're coming!
-You just relax, Doc. I got this. -They're coming. They're coming.
translation.es: - Tranquila, doc. Yo me encargo. - ¡Están viniendo!

translation.en: -They're coming! [laughs] -Goddamn apocalypse.
They're coming! They're coming! They're coming! [laughs]
[woman 1] Please, let us in!
[woman 2] Open the door! Please, let us in!
translation.es: ¡Abran la puerta! ¡Dios, por favor, déjennos entrar!

translation.en: Open this door!
-Goddamn it, open the goddamn door! -[woman 2] Help us! Let us in!
translation.es: - ¡Déjennos entrar! - ¡Sabemos que están ahí! - ¡Abran la maldita puerta! - ¡Ayúdenos! - ¡Déjennos entrar! - ¡Vamos, deprisa!

translation.en: [woman 1] Do it! Hurry up!
Come on, hurry! Hurry, let us in!
translation.es: -¡Deprisa! ¡Déjennos entrar! - ¡No puedo dejarlos entrar, lo siento!

translation.en: -I can't let you in here, I'm sorry. -Just open the door!
translation.es: -¡Deprisa! ¡Déjennos entrar! - ¡No puedo dejarlos entrar, lo siento! ¡Abra! Tiene que dejarnos entrar.

translation.en: -You have to let us in! -Do not attempt to open the door.
translation.es: ¡Abra! Tiene que dejarnos entrar. No intenten abrir la puerta. Tiene un explosivo. No podrán.

translation.en: It's booby-trapped. You will not succeed.
translation.es: No intenten abrir la puerta. Tiene un explosivo. No podrán.

translation.en: -No! Let us in! -Come on!
I'm a United States Marine,
and I've been ordered to guard this facility.
translation.es: y me ordenaron proteger este edificio!

translation.en: I can't compromise my mission. I'm sorry.
translation.es: No puedo comprometer mi misión, lo siento.

translation.en: -Open the door, Marine, goddamn it! -We're gonna die out here!
translation.es: - Abre la puerta, marine, ¡maldita sea! - Moriremos si seguimos aquí.

translation.en: -Ted? -Yes, it's me, asshole!
-Open the door! That's a direct order! -[woman 1] Hurry, open this door!
Let us in this place!
Please, open this door! We'll die out here!
translation.es: ¡Por favor, abra la puerta! Moriremos aquí.

translation.en: -They're coming! -You gotta let us in!
-Go, go, go! Move! -Go, go!
-[Ted] Get inside now! -Wendy!
-To me! -John!
-Wendy! -Get your ass in here!
-[Ted] John! -[John] Wendy!
-[Ted] John! -Get your ass inside now.
-Go. Go. Go. -[John] Wendy!
Go.
[Ted] All right, go, go, go!
Come on, let's go! Let's go! Inside, inside!
Thank you. [pants]
Thank you.
-What's up with that guy? -Oh, that's Sam.
translation.es: - ¿Qué le pasa a ese tipo? - Es Sam.

translation.en: Don't worry about thanking him, the guy's deaf. He can't hear you.
translation.es: No te preocupes por agradecerle. Es sordo, no te oye.

translation.en: [John] Wendy! Did she make it?
-I thought she was with you? -No, she was right behind me.
translation.es: - Pensé que estaba contigo. - No, estaba justo detrás de mí.

translation.en: [John] Wendy!
Wendy!
-Oh, that was some serious... -[John] Wendy!
I'll explain it all when we're alone. -Roger that. -[chuckles]
translation.es: - Te lo explicaré cuando estemos solos. - Entendido.

translation.en: You make that yourself? It's very crafty.
Oh, I am seriously glad you're still here.
translation.es: ¡Estoy tan contento de que aún estés aquí!

translation.en: -[scoffs] You smell like gas, brother. -[laughs]
Hey, my wife's out there.
I thought she got in, but she got lost in the fray.
translation.es: Pensé que había entrado pero se perdió en el la refriega.

translation.en: -We gotta go get her. -Nothing I can do about that, I'm sorry.
translation.es: - Debemos buscarla. - No puedo hacer nada, lo siento.

translation.en: What are you talking about? A woman is stuck out there.
translation.es: ¿Qué quieres decir? Hay una mujer ahí fuera.

translation.en: She's gonna get torn apart by those things.
Opening those doors will compromise this facility and everything about our mission.
translation.es: Abrir esa puerta comprometería este edificio y toda la misión.

translation.en: -It's not gonna happen. -John!
-Hey. -John? John!
Everybody upstairs now.
End of discussion.
[Ted] Thanks for changing the codes on that door.
translation.es: Gracias por cambiar el código de la puerta.

translation.en: [Marine] Hey, you were gone for six months. -Bastard. -[Marine laughs]
translation.es: - Desapareciste seis meses. - Hijo de perra.

translation.en: Just be grateful I've still got the UV lights up and running.
translation.es: Agradece que aún tengo las luces ultravioleta funcionando.

translation.en: You know, I never even made it back to the base.
translation.es: Nunca pude volver a la base.

translation.en: I got cut off, tracked, chased all over hell.
translation.es: Me apartaron, me rastrearon y me siguieron por todos lados.

translation.en: Hey, the other guys...
-Gomez, Smitty, they make it back? -No.
translation.es: ¿Y los otros, Gómez, Smitty, volvieron? No.

translation.en: -I should have stayed put. -Yeah, maybe.
translation.es: - Debí haberme quedado ahí. - Sí, tal vez.

translation.en: Yeah. What about you? You're doing okay here? Oh, buddy, a barrel of laughs.
translation.es: - ¿Y tú, estuviste bien aquí? - Claro, pura diversión.

translation.en: Yeah, I bet. [sighs]
Is she still...?
Oh, yeah, she's still whatever she is. Sleeping Beauty.
translation.es: Sí, todavía así. La Bella Durmiente.

translation.en: So just you and the doc, hmm? This whole time, hmm?
translation.es: ¿Entonces estuvieron solo tú y la doc todo el tiempo?

translation.en: -Uh, you'll see. -Huh? Yeah?
Okay, almost there.
[Ted] I love what you've done with the place.
translation.es: Me encanta lo que has hecho aquí.

translation.en: -[marine] Whoa, whoa, it's okay. -Jesus, he's got a pet one.
-It's okay. It's okay. -Is that the doc? Oh, my God.
translation.es: - ¡Dios mío! ¡Tiene uno de mascota! - Tranquilos. ¿Es la doc? Santo cielo.

translation.en: Yeah, she got bit. And then I've just been--
translation.es: Sí, la mordieron, así que estuve...

translation.en: Oh, this ought to be good.
Hey, she was part of this mission too, smartass.
translation.es: Ella era parte de la misión, idiota.

translation.en: -Wasn't she? -Yeah, but, uh--
-Jesus. -[marine] Well, all right then.
Anybody touches her, I'll throw them off the roof.
translation.es: Si alguien la toca, los lanzaré por el techo.

translation.en: -She's been bit. -She's a vampire.
And what about this chick?
This "chick"...
doesn't exist as far as you're concerned.
You understand me?
-I said, do you understand me? -[kid] Yeah.
Okay then.
That's good.
[woman 1] Do you think we're safe in here, huh?
With one of those things penned up and then some--
translation.es: Con una de esas cosas encerrada aquí y esa otra...

translation.en: I don't even know what, in that other room.
translation.es: no sé qué en la otra sala.

translation.en: [woman 2] It's true.
Plus, look how he's treated John's wife. I mean, he's an animal.
translation.es: Además, vieron cómo trató a la esposa de John, es un animal.

translation.en: You leave a guy in a cage, he becomes an animal.
translation.es: Un tipo encerrado se convierte en un animal.

translation.en: [woman 3] Okay, shh... He's an animal with a machine gun.
translation.es: Sí, pero es un animal con ametralladora.

translation.en: [woman 1] Oh, please. You know he's feeding her, right?
That vampire? He's actually feeding her his own blood.
translation.es: ¿A la vampira? La está alimentando con su sangre.

translation.en: [John] Hey there, soldier man.
Axel, right?
[sniffs] Your name, I mean.
Come on, man, I'm trying.
Okay, great. Well, look, uh...
Ugh, I'm sorry about what happened earlier. Obviously, I was a little--
translation.es: ...lamento lo que pasó antes, es obvio que estaba un poco...

translation.en: But my-my wife's out there.
translation.es: Pero mi mujer está ahí fuera.

translation.en: -Yeah, she was. -Yeah. You gotta help me.
translation.es: - Sí, estaba. - Sí, tienes que ayudarme.

translation.en: Let me out there. I don't care what happens to me.
translation.es: Déjame salir. No me importa lo que me pase.

translation.en: I don't, but my wife's stuck out there.
translation.es: En serio, pero mi espera está ahí.

translation.en: I already told you, we're not opening those doors again.
translation.es: Ya te lo dije, no volveremos a abrir esa puerta.

translation.en: It's too dangerous. It's suicide out there.
translation.es: Es demasiado peligroso. Es un suicidio salir.

translation.en: You know what it's like. You've been out there.
translation.es: Tú lo sabes, estuviste ahí fuera.

translation.en: Listen to me.
Listen! I need to get out there!
It's not gonna happen.
Enough! Enough.
-Now I get how you feel, I do. -[grunts]
translation.es: Entiendo cómo te sientes, lo sé.

translation.en: But there is nothing that we can do for her.
translation.es: Pero no podemos hacer nada por ella.

translation.en: -[grunts] All right! -So we stay inside.
translation.es: Pero no podemos hacer nada por ella. - ¡Está bien! - Nos quedaremos adentro.

translation.en: [grunts] All right.
-All right. -[sighs]
End of discussion.
Oh, I can't believe the doc.
translation.es: No puedo creer lo de la doc.

translation.en: -Well, she was always... -Yeah.
Six months now.
It happened right when you and the boys headed out.
translation.es: Sucedió justo cuando tú y los demás salieron.

translation.en: What?
I was giving you covering fire. She, um...
Yeah, no, I remember. You were up on the roof.
translation.es: Sí, lo recuerdo. Estabas en el techo.

translation.en: Yeah.
She went down to make sure the door got shut behind you.
translation.es: Bajó para asegurarse de que la puerta quedara cerrada.

translation.en: I told her she didn't have to do it, but she insisted.
translation.es: Le dije que no hacía falta pero insistió.

translation.en: And then... You know, when all hell broke loose, and you guys were getting picked off...
translation.es: Y luego comenzó el infierno, los atraparon a ustedes.

translation.en: She tried to help Smitty get back inside, and one of them...
translation.es: Ella trató de ayudar a Smitty a entrar y uno de ellos...

translation.en: got a hold of her, took a chunk out of her arm.
translation.es: ...la tomó. Le sacó un trozo de brazo.

translation.en: She turned right after that.
Damn.
Yeah, pretty much.
[Ted] It's just-- It's gonna be a tough sell, convincing some of those people to live in the same place as one of those things.
translation.es: Será difícil convencer a esa gente de convivir con una de esas cosas.

translation.en: [Axel] I'm not convincing nobody of nothing.
translation.es: Yo no convenceré a nadie de nada.

translation.en: -And I never said they were staying. -That's very true, you did not.
translation.es: - Y nunca dije que se quedarán aquí. - Es cierto, no lo dijiste.

translation.en: Look, I'll give you the door codes later, a set of keys.
translation.es: Mira, te daré el código de la puerta y un juego de llaves más tarde.

translation.en: Maybe a couple of the others when I feel like I can trust them.
translation.es: Tal vez a algunos de los otros que sienta que son confiables.

translation.en: Yeah, that's a good idea. We're gonna need all the help we can get,
translation.es: Sí, es buena idea. Necesitaremos toda la ayuda posible.

translation.en: although some of them have been acting up, especially with that John guy.
translation.es: El comportamiento de algunos... sobre todo de ese tal John.

translation.en: Don't-- Watch that there.
And this here, this bad boy's new.
translation.es: Y este es el nuevo chico malo.

translation.en: Damn, you're like Robinson Crusoe or some shit. [sniffs]
How did you hook up with that crew?
Oh, hiding in holes in basements and anywhere you can think of.
translation.es: Escondiéndome en sótanos y en cualquier lugar que te imagines.

translation.en: You find another frightened fish, and then you just decide to throw them together.
translation.es: Encuentras a alguien asustado como tú y decides quedarte con él.

translation.en: You know, you're running. You're always running.
Ferals chasing you like wild animals.
And the feeders, smarter. Tracking you down.
You don't know what it's like out there. You have no idea.
translation.es: No sabes cómo es ahí fuera. No tienes idea.

translation.en: A person will do anything, for just one more day. Anything.
translation.es: Cualquiera haría cualquier cosa por un día más. Cualquier cosa.

translation.en: Well, damn it, Robinson Crusoe! Robinson!
Now, while they're not here.
Kill the other one too.
-Yeah, let's do it. -Hell, yes.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. Back up, people. This is not a petting zoo.
translation.es: Atrás todos. Esto no es un zoológico.

translation.en: Who are you supposed to be? Shaka Zulu?
-In charge, that's what. -Yeah? -Until the army guy comes back. -[roars]
translation.es: Estoy a cargo. Hasta que vuelva el soldado.

translation.en: -Yeah, that's right. You're real tough. -Try me, ass face.
translation.es: Sí, claro, eres muy rudo. Pruébame, imbécil.

translation.en: Get out of my fucking way now.
What?
-[feral snarling] -[Axel] Incoming!
-Everybody, get out of here! -[Ted] Let's go!
-Get up! Move! -Sam, Sam, Sam. Vampires swarming.
-[Ted] Heads up! -Come on, let's go!
-[screams] -Clear! Clear!
-[Karen] No! -[laughs]
-[Karen] No! John, please, help me! -I'm sorry.
-No! -I'm sorry.
-I'm sorry! [sobs] -[Doc laughing]
I'm sorry! [screams]
Dylan. [pants]
[sobs] Who the hell are you?
Oh... Oh, goddamn it.
That's disgusting. Oh, Jesus.
I can't believe you're still dumping them in there.
translation.es: No puedo creer que sigas arrojándolos ahí.

translation.en: -[Axel] You two wanna go grab the others? -[sighs]
translation.es: ¿Ustedes dos quieren ir por los otros?

translation.en: [sniffles] Thank you.
You know, my parents were in Hawaii with my brother when it happened.
translation.es: Mis padres estaban en Hawái con mi hermano cuando ocurrió.

translation.en: I was supposed to go too.
I lied...
and said I had a midterm.
translation.es: Les dije que tenía un examen.

translation.en: I was seeing this guy.
I'm sorry.
I was never like this before. It was--
I keep trying to get it together.
But what if I can't?
-Nothing broken or busted. -Shit.
-They didn't just push their way in. -[sighs] At least I don't think they did.
translation.es: No empujaron la puerta para entrar. Al menos eso creo.

translation.en: How many of the others did you give the codes to this door?
translation.es: ¿A cuántos más les diste el código de la puerta?

translation.en: Well, probably more than I should have.
translation.es: Tal vez a más de los que convenía.

translation.en: The black kid and the deaf guy...
translation.es: Al chico negro, al tipo sordo...

translation.en: If my bringing them here had anything to do with this, I'm sorry.
translation.es: Si traerlos aquí tuvo algo que ver con esto, lo lamento mucho.

translation.en: You know, I hate to say this, maybe we should toss them out right now
translation.es: Odio decir esto, pero quizás debamos echarlos ahora

translation.en: while we still have the chance and the firepower.
translation.es: que aún podemos y tenemos las armas.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I hear you.
We gotta protect Sleeping Beauty.
translation.es: Tenemos que proteger a la Bella Durmiente.

translation.en: Well... I'm not so sure about that. She's pretty damn good at that on her own.
translation.es: De eso no estoy tan seguro. - Parece que puede hacerlo sola. - Sí, ¿qué tal eso?

translation.en: Yeah, how about that, huh?
translation.es: - Parece que puede hacerlo sola. - Sí, ¿qué tal eso?

translation.en: [woman] What are you, anyway?
Why are you here?
I'm... I was...
I don't know.
-I don't remember. -You don't remember or you don't wanna tell me?
translation.es: - No lo recuerdo. - ¿No lo recuerdas o no quieres decirme?

translation.en: What happened?
-Why--? Where am I? -You were an animal last night.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde estoy? - Te comportaste como un animal anoche.

translation.en: Plus, you got bit by one of them and nothing happened.
translation.es: Además, uno de ellos te mordió y no sucedió nada.

translation.en: Not yet, anyway. Maybe you're still gonna turn. Who knows?
translation.es: Al menos por ahora, quizás te conviertas más tarde, ¿quién sabe?

translation.en: -I don't know what you're talking about. -Normal people don't react like that.
translation.es: - No sé de qué hablas. - La gente normal no reacciona así.

translation.en: So, what does that make you, huh? Seriously, what?
translation.es: Así que dime, ¿qué eres? En serio, ¿qué?

translation.en: -Back off. -What?
Look what happened to Karen. People are dying here because of you.
translation.es: Mira qué pasó con Karen. La gente muere por tu culpa.

translation.en: I don't know what happened here.
I don't know where I am. I have a daughter, Dylan.
translation.es: No sé dónde estoy. Tengo una hija, Dylan.

translation.en: That's all I know or care about.
translation.es: Es lo único que sé y me importa.

translation.en: I'm sorry but we've all lost a lot while you've been here sleeping.
translation.es: Lo siento, pero todos perdimos muchas cosas mientras tú dormías aquí.

translation.en: And this whole story of yours is just a little too weird.
translation.es: Y tu historia es un demasiado extraña.

translation.en: Back up.
Hey, hey, hey. All right, break it up.
[Axel] Hey, what did I tell you about this woman? Get out of here.
translation.es: - Oye. - ¿Qué dije sobre ella? ¡Lárgate de aquí!

translation.en: This is the reason we were attacked.
[Axel] You need to back the hell up and get the hell out of here now. Go!
translation.es: Vete ya de aquí y aléjate. ¡Vamos!

translation.en: Christ.
Here, I got you some, um, clothes.
Where's my daughter? Where's Dylan?
Uh, if you had a daughter and she's out there, she's... she's dead.
translation.es: Si tenías una hija y quedó fuera, está muerta.

translation.en: I'm sorry, but that's just a fact.
translation.es: Lo siento pero es la verdad.

translation.en: Look, he's just...
You know, he's been here a while and...
translation.es: Hace tiempo que está aquí dentro.

translation.en: I don't know what happened to you.
The world went to shit a couple years ago.
translation.es: Hace dos años el mundo se convirtió en un infierno.

translation.en: Years?
We're just all trying to get by.
I can help you get out of here.
translation.es: Yo puedo ayudarte a salir de aquí.

translation.en: So you can find your daughter. Just give me a chance to figure it out.
translation.es: Para que busques a tu hija. Solo déjame pensar cómo.

translation.en: Axel, the other Marine, you know, he's okay.
translation.es: Axel, el otro marine, es bueno,

translation.en: He's just a little by the book and all that shit.
translation.es: solo que sigue demasiado las reglas.

translation.en: I'll help you out.
You don't gotta worry about me, lady.
I've seen everything you got for three years. I'm pretty much over you.
translation.es: He visto todo de ti durante tres años. Ya estoy acostumbrado.

translation.en: My name's Vanessa.
Okay... Vanessa.
Well... we don't got that much water, so it makes sense to double up on showers.
translation.es: No tenemos mucha agua así que es mejor bañarse de a dos.

translation.en: You know, we turn it off when we're soaping up. That's the rule.
translation.es: Y la cerramos cuando nos enjabonamos. Es la regla.

translation.en: So can you tell me? What the hell happened to me?
Please.
Look, I don't know what happened to you.
translation.es: Oye, no sé qué te sucedió.

translation.en: I didn't even know you had a daughter.
translation.es: Ni siquiera sabía que tenías una hija.

translation.en: We got sent in here to pick up a dead body.
translation.es: Fuimos enviados aquí para recoger un cadáver.

translation.en: Then some volcano goes off in Wyoming, wipes out half the Western states.
translation.es: Luego un volcán se activó en Wyoming, destruyó todos los estados del oeste.

translation.en: After that, people just started killing each other.
translation.es: Después todos comenzaron a matarse entre ellos.

translation.en: People did?
Yeah, well, it makes you feel like an idiot to call them vampires,
translation.es: Sí, bueno, te sientes un idiota cuando les dices vampiros

translation.en: but they drink blood so, you know, you decide.
translation.es: pero beben sangre así que, tú decide.

translation.en: -And so you guys here, you were-- -Yeah, we got dropped in.
translation.es: - Entonces ustedes están aquí... - Sí, de casualidad.

translation.en: Half dozen of us got dumped off.
Our orders were to protect you and the doctor, that's all.
translation.es: Nos dieron la orden de protegerte a ti y a la doctora.

translation.en: We were supposed to hold this position until we were relieved.
translation.es: Debíamos quedarnos aquí hasta nuevo aviso.

translation.en: Folks have been calling this thing "The Rising".
translation.es: Todos le dicen a esto El levantamiento.

translation.en: Whatever it is.
I don't know.
I did my duty. I watched you.
translation.es: Yo hice lo mío. Te vigilé.

translation.en: I kept the doc alive after she got bit. That's it.
translation.es: Mantuve a la doctora viva cuando la mordieron. Es todo.

translation.en: But why me? Why would anybody be interested in me?
translation.es: ¿Pero por qué yo? ¿Por qué alguien estaba interesado en mí?

translation.en: I always figured you'd tell me after you woke up.
translation.es: Siempre creí que tú me lo dirías cuando despertaras.

translation.en: It's gotta have something to do with this thing though.
translation.es: Pero tiene que estar relacionado con todo esto.

translation.en: It has to.
I have no idea.
I mean, I'm nothing special.
-Honest. -Well, somebody thought you were.
Looks like they were right.
translation.es: Y parece que no se equivocó.

translation.en: If anybody knew, it was Doc, but... [sighs]
translation.es: Si alguien lo sabía, era Doc pero...

translation.en: She said you should have died already.
translation.es: Dijo que ya deberías haber muerto.

translation.en: That you were killed or... Then you weren't or you couldn't be.
translation.es: Que te mataron, que no moriste, no pudieron matarte...

translation.en: I don't know, man. I just watched you.
translation.es: No lo sé, yo solo te vigilé.

translation.en: Let's go. Very slow, very quiet.
That's a hell of a way to say thank you, Vanessa.
translation.es: Qué manera de dar las gracias, Vanessa.

translation.en: -[Axel] Whoa, hey, hey. -[Ted] What's going on here?
Easy, easy, easy.
-[Vanessa] Shoot me if you want. -It's all good.
translation.es: - Dispárame si quieres. - Todo está bien.

translation.en: But I'm getting out of this place right now.
translation.es: Pero saldré de aquí ahora mismo.

translation.en: -I don't give a shit about what you do. -You're not gonna get 20 blocks by yourself, I promise you.
translation.es: - Me importa un carajo lo que me hicieron. - No irás ni a la esquina sola, te juro.

translation.en: -The man's got a point. -I'll take my chances.
-Hey. -Just...
I'll see if any of the others wanna come with me.
translation.es: Veré si alguno de los otros quiere venir conmigo.

translation.en: You and the others, you're just gonna walk past all my booby traps?
translation.es: ¿Tú y ellos pasarán todas las trampas que hay, - abrirán los candados? - Bien, esto es lo que vamos a hacer.

translation.en: -You're gonna get through all the locks? -All right, this is what we're gonna do.
translation.es: - abrirán los candados? - Bien, esto es lo que vamos a hacer.

translation.en: I'm gonna escort the little lady back to the lab.
Get some pants on and join us.
translation.es: Tú vístete y ven con nosotros.

translation.en: [sighs] All right, that suits me. Just everybody stay cool.
translation.es: Me parece bien. Por favor, tranquilos.

translation.en: Let's go.
You okay?
Oh, okay, we gotta get some stuff together now.
translation.es: - Sí. - Debemos juntar algunas cosas juntos.

translation.en: -Food, water. We're gonna get out of here. -Fine by me. [exhales]
translation.es: Comida, agua. Saldremos de aquí. Bien.

translation.en: Where are you two heading off to?
[sighs] Axel, I'm just helping the lady out.
translation.es: Axel, la estoy ayudando a salir.

translation.en: Nobody's going nowhere. Put the gun down.
translation.es: Nadie se irá. Deja el arma.

translation.en: -Axel-- -Now!
[Ted] Come on, Axel.
Axel, the mission is over. It's over.
Everything. The woman has a daughter.
translation.es: Todo. Y ella tiene una hija.

translation.en: She just wants to find her baby girl.
translation.es: Solo quiere encontrar a su hija.

translation.en: How are you gonna get out the front door?
-I'm gonna open it for her. -Really?
-The way you did last night? -What?
Somebody opened the front door, Ted.
Somebody disabled those lights. I think it was you.
translation.es: Alguien apagó las luces, fuiste tú.

translation.en: Bullshit, Axel, a bunch of people here had the codes.
translation.es: Mentira, Axel, muchos de ellos tienen los códigos.

translation.en: A bunch of people have the wrong codes, because I gave you all the wrong codes.
translation.es: Tienen los códigos equivocados porque yo les di códigos equivocados.

translation.en: But you knew where I keep the real ones, in my notebook.
translation.es: Pero tú sabías que tengo los correctos en mi anotador.

translation.en: You're the only one that knows that.
translation.es: Eres el único que lo sabe.

translation.en: All right. Hell, you got me this time.
-No! Stop it. Stop it! -Why are you doing this?
-Why are you doing this? Son of a bitch! -Stop it! Just... stop!
-[kid] Hey, what's going on? -[pan clunks]
[Axel] That stupid fucker.
That fucker.
[Ted] I don't care how we do this, but you're coming with me, sweetheart.
translation.es: No sé cómo lo haremos, pero tú vendrás conmigo, cariño.

translation.en: -Is that right? -I'm afraid so.
Dead or alive, it doesn't really matter.
translation.es: Vivos o muertos, no importa en realidad.

translation.en: Stop, Axel. I need to hand her over to them.
-Who? -Them.
I told them you existed, and now I'm gonna show them you do.
translation.es: Les conté de tu existencia y ahora se los demostraré.

translation.en: Stop! She's different!
They're gonna wanna see this. Maybe then they'll leave us alone.
translation.es: Ellos quieren verlo. Tal vez después nos dejen en paz.

translation.en: They promised me they would let us go!
Stop it! Don't you do it, Axel! Don't you do it!
If you understood what they did to me, what they did inside of me,
translation.es: Si entendieras lo que me hicieron, lo que hicieron dentro de mí,

translation.en: you'd know why I was taking her back. And I am taking her back.
translation.es: sabrías por qué la llevaré con ellos. ¡Y la llevaré con ellos!

translation.en: She's got superpowers now. Great.
[Axel] I'm sure this is all a lot to take in right now.
[Vanessa] Yeah, a little bit.
[Axel] And, well, waking up the way you did...
The world having gone to shit and everything.
[Vanessa] I just need to be alone right now, okay?
[Axel] Yeah, I know. I get that.
Well, if you need to talk or anything, I'll just be out here.
translation.es: Si necesitas hablar u otra cosa, estaré aquí.

translation.en: No offense, but go fuck yourself.
translation.es: No te ofendas pero vete al carajo.

translation.en: -Understood. -Good, then go do it.
Hey, you know what, lady? I'm just trying to do my job, okay?
translation.es: Oye, ¿sabes qué? Lo único que intento hacer es mi trabajo.

translation.en: -Just trying my very best to protect you! -I don't need protecting!
translation.es: - Hago lo que puedo para protegerte. - No necesito protección.

translation.en: -Really? -Yes!
And I will get out of here and find my daughter without your permission!
translation.es: Y saldré de aquí a buscar a mi hija sin tu permiso.

translation.en: Hey. You're gonna try.
Are you gonna stop me?
I have to. You know that.
Do what you gotta do.
translation.es: Haz lo que tengas que hacer.

translation.en: ♪ You'll never know, dear How much I love you ♪ ♪ Please don't take my sunshine away ♪
[man] Anybody in there?
Hello?
Anybody?
-Hello? -[metal clunking]
-♪ Please don't take my sunshine away ♪ -Hello?
Is anybody there?
Is there anybody?
Hello?
Help me. Please, please, please.
-Who are you? -[Axel] Jesus Christ.
translation.es: ¿Quiénes son? - ¡Cielo santo! - ¡Es uno de ellos, lo vi!

translation.en: -[woman] He was one of them, I saw him. -[John] He's a goddamn feeder!
translation.es: - ¡Cielo santo! - ¡Es uno de ellos, lo vi! ¡Es un maldito voraz!

translation.en: -[pants] -[kid] Yo, check his eyes, bro.
They're frigging human.
-[John] You did this. -Hey, hey, hey. Easy.
-[John] What the hell are you? -I didn't do anything.
translation.es: - ¿Qué demonios eres? - Yo no hice nada.

translation.en: -She turned me. I'm human again. -What?
translation.es: Ella me convirtió. Soy humano otra vez.

translation.en: Hey, you. Move, I'll blow your goddamn head off.
translation.es: - ¿Qué? - ¡Oye! - Muévete o te vuelo la cabeza. - ¿Cómo que tú lo convertiste?

translation.en: [woman] What does he mean, you turned him?
translation.es: - Muévete o te vuelo la cabeza. - ¿Cómo que tú lo convertiste?

translation.en: As soon as I tasted her blood, I...
I could feel again.
